gov.anl.ipns.Util.Messaging.Property
Class PropertyChangeConnector

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.Util.Messaging.Property.PropertyChangeConnector

public class PropertyChangeConnector
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to connect several PropertyChangeHandlers together. That is, the PropertyChangeHandlers can be thought of as nodes that are positioned on the outer edge of a circle. Then, a PropertyChangeConnector can be thought of as a node at the center of the circle. When a property has changed, one of the PropertyChangeHandlers on the edge of the circle would inform the PropertyChangeConnector at the circle's center via the propertyChanged() method. The PropertyChangeConnector would in turn redirect the message to all of the other PropertyChangeHandlers exactly once. Thus, in summary, this class is used to redirect messages across several PropertyChangeHandlers and is responsible for making sure that each PropertyChangeHandler is informed exactly once.

Constructor Detail

PropertyChangeConnector

public PropertyChangeConnector()
Constructs a PropertyChangeConnector without any initial known PropertyChangeHandlers.

PropertyChangeConnector

public PropertyChangeConnector(java.util.Vector handlerVec)
Constructs a PropertyChangeConnector with the initial known PropertyChangeHandlers as specified.

Parameters:
handlerVec - The Vector of PropertyChangeHandlers that this connector originally knows about. If this parameter is null, the connector is constructed without any known PropertyChangeHandlers.
Method Detail

addHandler

public void addHandler(PropertyChangeHandler handler)
Adds the specified PropertyChangeHandler to the list of handlers that are informed when a property has changed.

Parameters:
handler - The PropertyChangeHandler to add to this class's record of handlers. When a property changes, this handler will be informed.

removeHandler

public void removeHandler(PropertyChangeHandler handler)
Removes the specified PropertyChangeHandler from the list of handlers that are informed when a property has changed.

Parameters:
handler - The PropertyChangeHandler to remove from this class's record of handlers. When a property changes, this handler will be no longer be informed.

propertyChanged

public void propertyChanged(java.lang.String property,
                            java.lang.Object newValue,
                            PropertyChangeHandler source)
Invoke this method to inform this connector that the given property has changed. This connector will in turn inform all of the other PropertyChangeHandlers that the given property has changed. That is, all PropertyChangeHandlers except the PropertyChangeHandler specified by the parameter source will be informed.

Parameters:
property - A string alias for the property that has changed.
newValue - The property's new value.
source - The PropertyChangeHandler that is informing this connector that the property has changed.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Testbed.

Parameters:
args - Unused.
